topic.title: Now Available: Foreign Relations of the United States, 1981–1988, Volume V, Soviet Union, March 1985–October 1986
topic.body: This volume documents the development and implementation of the Reagan administration’s policies toward the Soviet Union from March 1985 to October 1986.
topic.image-description: Book Cover of Foreign Relations of the United States, 1981–1988, Volume V, Soviet Union, March 1985–October 1986
topic.image-source-information: Created by the Office of the Historian
